app_description.message: ChatGPT Custom Shortcuts Pro adds keyboard shortcuts to scroll, copy, start new chats, toggle the sidebar, switch models, and more.

label_toggle_sidebar_folders.message: Toggle Sidebar Folders Down for Repairs

tt_send.message: Enable to make Control + Enter send the message.

tt_stop.message: Enable to make Control + Backspace stop response generation.

tt_hide_arrows.message: Enable arrow buttons to quickly move to the previous or next message with a click.

tt_scroll_up_one.message: Scrolls up one message at a time.

tt_scroll_down_one.message: Scrolls down one message at a time.

tt_scroll_top.message: Scrolls up to the first message.

tt_pgup_pgdown.message: Enable to make PageUp and PageDown always scroll the conversation.

tt_send_top_bar.message: Enable to place the model selector below the message box. Great for small screens.

tt_opacity_slider.message: Slide right to keep the bottom bar visible. Slide left to hide it until you hover.

tt_select_copy.message: Simulates mouse-selecting the text of one message and pressing Ctrl+C. Press repeatedly to cycle through visible messages.

tt_select_copy_behavior.message: Choose whether to select any message, only ChatGPT's responses, or only your messages.

tt_select_assistant.message: Only select messages sent by ChatGPT.

tt_select_user.message: Only select messages sent by you.

tt_disable_autocopy.message: Check to disable auto-copy (i.e. only highlight the text).

tt_edit_msg.message: Click edit on the lowest visible user message. Press again to go to the next one up.

tt_join_all.message: Join and copy every ChatGPT response in the conversation. User messages are excluded.

tt_join_separator.message: When using the `Join + Copy All Responses` shortcut, you can add a custom separator between responses. To insert line breaks, place a space before each \n.

tt_join_code.message: Join and copy all code boxes in the conversation. Code boxes in user messages are excluded.

tt_code_separator.message: When using the `Join + Copy All Code Boxes` shortcut, you can add a custom separator between each code box. To insert line breaks, place a space before each \n.

tt_showModelPicker_plain.message: Show the ChatGPT Plus model picker

tt_regenerate.message: Click 'Try Again' on the lowest visible response.

tt_rememberSidebarScrollPositionCheckbox.message: Enable to remember the sidebar scroll position.

tt_slim_opacity_slider.message: Fade the slim sidebar. Hover mouse to reveal.

tt_temp_chat.message: Toggle Temporary Chat (available before you send the first message.)

tt_think_longer.message: Only available in the free version. Engage deeper reasoning for a more thorough answer.

tt_study.message: Toggle tool to explain step-by-step, link concepts, and reinforce understanding.

tt_add_photos_files.message: Attach images or files to a message.

tt_toggle_dictate.message: Press once to start dictation. Press again to submit dictation.

tt_cancel_dictation.message: Cancel dictation in progress without transcribing.

tt_share.message: Create a link to share the conversation.

tt_backup_restore.message: Export or import all extension settings.

tt_export.message: Export your settings to a JSON file.

tt_import.message: Import settings from a JSON file.

toast_export_success.message: Settings exported to file. Check your downloads folder.

toast_import_no_compatible.message: No compatible settings found in file.

confirm_import_overwrite.message: Import settings from file and overwrite current values?

tt_reset_defaults.message: Reset all options and shortcuts to defaults

tt_selectThenCopyAllMessages.message: Simulates mouse-selecting the text of all messages and pressing Ctrl+C. Text keeps formatting when pasting to ms word or an email.

tt_selectThenCopyAllMessagesBehavior.message: Choose whether Join + Copy All includes all messages, only ChatGPT responses (default), or only your messages.

tt_selectThenCopyAllMessagesBothUserAndC.message: Include messages sent by both you and ChatGPT.

tt_selectThenCopyAllMessagesOnlyAssistan.message: Only include messages sent by ChatGPT (i.e. omit user messages).

tt_selectThenCopyAllMessagesOnlyUser.message: Only include messages sent by you (i.e. omit ChatGPT responses).

tt_doNotIncludeLabelsCheckbox.message: Check to remove 'ChatGPT said:' and 'You said:' before each message.

tt_copy_plain.message: Copy any one message as plain text. Press again to cycle through visible copy buttons.

tt_strip_md.message: Enable to remove Markdown *s and ###s from text copied with the `Click Copy Button` shortcut. Text copied from a code box will not be altered.

tt_prev_thread.message: Alt+{shortcut}: clicks the lowest visible '<' previous thread button. ———————————————————  Ctrl+Alt+{shortcut}: scrolls to find other responses with multiple threads.

tt_next_thread.message: Alt+{shortcut}: clicks the lowest visible '>' next thread button.  ——————————————————— Ctrl+Alt+{shortcut}: scrolls to find other responses with multiple threads.

toast_import_complete.message: Import complete. Close then reopen settings to see changes.

tt_pick_model_plain.message: Click the first slot, then press Tab to cycle through and reveal model names. ——————————————————— Press any key to set a shortcut, Backspace to clear, Tab to skip.

tt_use_Control_for_picker.message: Use Control+{{shortcut}} to switch models. ——————————————————— Click the first slot, then press Tab to cycle through and reveal model names. ——————————————————— Press any key to set a shortcut, Backspace to clear, Tab to skip.

tt_use_Alt_for_picker.message: Use Alt+{{shortcut}} to switch models. ——————————————————— Click the first slot, then press Tab to cycle through and reveal model names. ——————————————————— Press any key to set a shortcut, Backspace to clear, Tab to skip.

tt_RegenerateAskToChangeResponse.message: Type how you want the previous response changed or improved.

tt_RegenerateWithDifferentModel.message: Creates a new response using a different AI model.

tt_ReadAloud.message: Press to hear the response read aloud. Press again to stop.

tt_BranchInNewChat.message: Copies the chat so far and starts a new conversation from this point—so you can explore a new path without losing either thread.

tt_AddDetails.message: Makes the previous response longer with more details.

tt_switchToThinkingExtended.message: Switch directly to GPT-5 Extended Thinking, which takes more time to handle harder problems.

tt_switchToThinkingStandard.message: Switch directly to GPT-5 Standard Thinking, which answers faster for most tasks.
